title: 02-Presentation Test Quarto
text:
References



https://nfdi4microbiota.de



Leonelli, Sabina. 2016. Data-Centric Biology: A Philosophical Study. Chicago ; London: The University of Chicago Press.


Rhee, Seung Yon. 2004. “Carpe Diem. Retooling the ‘Publish or Perish’ Model into the ‘Share and Survive’ Model.” Plant Physiology 134 (2): 543–47. https://doi.org/10.1104/pp.103.035907.


Rocca-Serra, Philippe, Susanna-Assunta Sansone, Danielle Welter, and Alasdair J. G. Gray. 2023. “Selecting Terminologies and Ontologies.” The FAIR Cookbook. https://w3id.org/faircookbook/FCB020.

title: About
text: This website and the associated pages are a testing ground for hosting revealjs presentations.
